title: Citi Third Quarter 2020 Earnings Review
summary: New York - Citigroup will issue its third quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (ET) on Tuesday, October 13, 2020. At 10 a.m. (ET), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-2: New York – Citigroup will issue its third quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (ET) on Tuesday, October 13, 2020. At 10 a.m. (ET), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The press release, webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-4: To dial-in to the live teleconference, please call (866) 516-9582 (for U.S. and Canada callers) or (973) 409-9210 (for international callers). Conference ID: 9492234. A telephonic replay of the call will be available beginning approximately two hours after the event until Tuesday, October 20, 2020 by calling (855) 859-2056 (for U.S. and Canada callers) or (404) 537-3406 (for international callers). Conference ID: 9492234.
tag-5: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-6: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi.
tag-7: Contacts Media: Brendan McManus, (212) 793-7064 Investors: Elizabeth Lynn, (212) 559-2718 Fixed Income Investors: Thomas Rogers, (212) 559-5091
